articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Government Delegation of Namibia
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Government Delegation of Namibia
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a friendly talk with the Namibian government delegation led by Foreign Minister Marco Hausiku at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Friday.
					 On hand were Kim Hyong Jun, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and officials concerned.

articles.title: Minutes of Talks between DPRK and Namibian Foreign Ministers Signed
articles.content:
Minutes of Talks between DPRK and Namibian Foreign Ministers Signed
 Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- Minutes of the talks held between the foreign ministers of the DPRK and Namibia were signed in Pyongyang on Friday.
					 Present at a signing ceremony were Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun and officials concerned from the DPRK side and members of the Namibian government delegation led by Foreign Minister Marco Hausiku from the Namibian side.
					
					 The minutes were inked by Pak Ui Chun and Marco Hausiku.

articles.title: Namibian Government Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Namibian Government Delegation Leaves
 Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- The government delegation of the Republic of Namibia headed by Foreign Minister Marco Hausiku left here on Friday after winding up its five-day visit to the DPRK.
					 During its stay in the DPRK the delegation visited Mangyongdae, the Arch of Triumph, the Three-Revolution Exhibition, the Pyongyang 326 Electric Wire Factory and other places.

articles.title: Yang Hyong Sop Meets Delegation of Myanmar
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets Delegation of Myanmar
 Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a friendly talk with the delegation of the Ministry of Sports of Myanmar headed by Minister Aye Myint at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Friday.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Myanmar Minister of Sports
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Myanmar Minister of Sports
 Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by Minister of Sports of Myanmar Aye Myint on a visit to the DPRK.
					 It was conveyed to Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, by the minister today.

articles.title: Congratulations to Gabonese FM
articles.content:
Congratulations to Gabonese FM
 Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun Thursday sent a congratulatory message to Paul Toungui upon his appointment as minister of Foreign Affairs, Cooperation and Francophone and Regional Integration of Gabon.
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would become more vital and mutual support and solidarity grow stronger in the international arena, the message wished him great success in his new job.

articles.title: Chinese Delegation Here
articles.content:
Chinese Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Chinese Ministry of Water Resources headed by Chief Engineer Liu Ning            arrived here on Friday.

articles.title: National Software Contest and Exhibition Opens
articles.content:
National Software Contest and Exhibition Opens
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- The 19th National Software Contest and Exhibition was opened.
					 Displayed there are hundreds of computer application programs of Korean style developed by scientists, technicians, youth and students from across the country and data contributed by different ministries and national institutions and units about their introduction of IT to production, technological updating and business management.
					
					 The period of the contest and exhibition will witness a competition in speech and words recognition programs and mechanical translation programs, a lecture on the trend of the IT development and IT exchange and program service.
					
					 An opening ceremony took place at the Three-Revolution Exhibition on Oct. 23.
					
					 Present there were Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Ro Tu Chol, vice-premier of the Cabinet, officials of ministries, national institutions and universities and program developers. 
					
					 Pyon Yong Rip, president of the State Academy of Sciences, made an opening address.

articles.title: Mongolian Diplomats Help Korean Farmers
articles.content:
Mongolian Diplomats Help Korean Farmers
 Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- Sodovjamts Khurelbaatar, Mongolian ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy did friendship work at the DPRK-Mongolia Friendship Jongbang Cooperative Farm in Sariwon City, North Hwanghae Province, on Friday. 
					 The guests helped farmers in carrying rice sheaves.
					
					 They handed aid materials to the farm.

articles.title: New Scientific Films Released
articles.content:
New Scientific Films Released
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- The Korean Documentary and Scientific Film Studio has newly produced several scientific films.
					Among them are the scientific films "Flexible Manufacturing System with Machining Center", "Intellectual Property" and "Wormwood Rice Cake, National Food".
					
					The film "Flexible Manufacturing System for Machining Center" shows in order the components of the new manufacturing system with great economic effectiveness and its processing method, explaining in plain words what the newly developed system is different from the old one.
					
					"Intellectual Property" explains the important role of the intellectual property system in the development of science and economy, giving details about the laws on intellectual property adopted in the DPRK and activities to protect intellectual property.
					
					"Wormwood Rice Cake, National Food" tells about the origin of wormwood rice cake through a historical tale, introduces wormwood good for health in a scientific way and gives easy methods of making various kinds of wormwood rice cake for housewives.
					
					The scientific films are helpful toward widening the common knowledge of the working people and disseminating new knowledge among them.

articles.title: Scenic Mt. Chilbo
articles.content:
Scenic Mt. Chilbo
 Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- The autumn scenery of Mt. Chilbo, a noted mountain of Korea, is beyond description these days. The beautiful maples and fully ripened wild fruits there strike the visitors with admiration.
					 It has been known as Hambuk Kumgang, which means Mt. Kumgang in North Hamgyong Province, for its prominent mountain and sea scenery from olden times and Chilbo, its name, means seven kinds of rare valuables.
					
					 The ancestors called it by various names according to seasons. It was called "Kkotdongsan" (flowery mountain) in spring with all kinds of flowers in full bloom. It was called "Rokumsan" (wooded mountain) in summer, "Hongasan" (red mountain) in autumn with red maples and "Solbaeksan" (snow-covered mountain) in winter.
					
					 Ecstatic, indeed, is the landscape of the mountain--thickly wooded mountain ridges, narrow and long valleys, mysterious peaks and rocks, crystal-clear streams in valleys, fresh water-falls and ponds, cliffs on the coast, wonderful rock islets in the sea and hot springs gushing out all the year round.
					
					 Mt. Chilbo with such beautiful landscape is a pride and scenic spot of Korea.
					
					 For the beautiful scenery of the mountain, the large-size Korean painting "Mt. Chilbo in Autumn" came into being as a world famous picture.
					
					 In recent years, pavilions and sightseeing roads have been constructed in different places including Ogundae and various welfare service facilities arranged in their distinctive ways, turning the mountain into a wonderful tourist resort.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Suppression of Education in Reunification Issue under Fire
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Suppression of Education in Reunification Issue under Fire
 Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Teachers Sub-Committee of the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration issued a statement on October 23 denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group for incriminating and suppressing the activities of the Teachers Union of south Korea (Jongyojo) for education in the reunification issue.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The group of traitors labeled Jongyojo an "enemy-benefiting organization" with sheer sophism that the above-said education conducted by Jongyojo since the publication of the June 15 joint declaration "served the purpose of embellishing the north and making the conception of the principal enemy ambiguous." Worse still, the group is working hard to destroy Jongyojo by mobilizing even gangsters of an ill-famed conservative organization under the motto of "eliminating pro-north leftist forces."
					
					The group went the lengths of searching all of a sudden an office and house of a member of Jongyojo, confiscated teaching materials and arrested and put him in custody for the mere reason that he conducted education in the reunification issue. It also barred educationists from visiting Pyongyang to take part in a meeting of educationists of the north and the south for implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 The Lee group is directing the spearhead of fascist suppression to Jongyojo after creating a terror-ridden atmosphere in south Korea under the pretext of "security." This is a fascist and anti-reunification action to stamp out the patriotic organizations for the reunification movement struggling for the implementation of the above-said declarations which represent the idea of national independence and unity and block the teachers' righteous activities for education in the reunification issue.
					
					 The Teachers Sub-Committee of the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration bitterly condemns such treacherous anti-reunification acts of the Lee group as savagely trampling down upon the inviolable rights and freedom of the teachers of south Korea , bringing back the era of fascist dictatorship and inciting the north-south confrontation.
					
					 Neither bayonet nor suppression can ever stamp out justice and truth.
					
					All the teachers of the northern half of Korea will always extend full support and solidarity to Jongyojo in its just activities and firmly join hands with the teachers in the south to usher in a new era of independent reunification, peace and prosperity under the banner of "By our nation itself."

articles.title: S. Korean Confrontational Maniacs' Wild Rumor Dismissed
articles.content:
S. Korean Confrontational Maniacs' Wild Rumor Dismissed
 Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- A few days ago, riff-raffs under the mask of "scholar" floated a wild rumor about what they called "organized abduction of civilians" by the north in the period of the June 25 war and the like at the prodding of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors. This comes under fire by signed commentaries of leading newspapers today. 
					 The above-said diatribe is nothing but a despicable plot of those keen to seek a pretext for steadily bedeviling the inter-Korean relations out of bitterness towards fellow countrymen as it is the renewed unbearable insult and provocation to the DPRK, they observe. 
					
					The aim sought by the Lee group in floating groundless rumor is to push the deadlocked inter-Korean relations to an extreme phase and, at the same time, stoke hostility and distrust in fellow countrymen in the south Korean society and totally hamstring the implementation of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, notes Rodong Sinmun. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The Lee group is becoming vociferous in the row to distort history under the pretext of putting an end to the so-called "leftist tendency," asserting without hesitation that "history can be rewritten if a regime is replaced by a new one." Consequently, the people's just struggle against injustice and dictatorship is branded as "rebellion of leftist forces" and such crimes committed by traitor Syngman Rhee, puppet of the U.S., against humanity as killing tens of thousands of fellow countrymen during his tenure of office including the period of past war and others are whitewashed to an intolerable extent. It is crystal clear that this is a revelation of the black-hearted intention of the said group to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK by rewriting history to serve the ultra-right conservative purpose and recklessly fabricating any case. 
					
					It is part of the above-said scenario that the nonsensical story about "abduction of civilians" was faked up and the funny anti-DPRK burlesque is going on in south Korea. 
					
					 The above-said ruckus is as foolish an act as the desperate effort made by those who find themselves in a dilemma to seek a way out of it. The regime of traitors in the grip of the worst ruling crisis is trying hard to find a way out in kicking up a racket of confrontation with the DPRK as the last resort but this will get them nowhere.  
					
					 Minju Joson urges the Lee group to bear this in mind and immediately stop the reckless anti-DPRK smear campaign.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Foiling Ultra-Right Conservatives' Moves for Confrontation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Foiling Ultra-Right Conservatives' Moves for Confrontation
 Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- The ultra-right conservative "policy towards the north" of the Lee Myung Bak regime is a stumbling block lying in the way of improving the inter-Korean relations, observes Rodong Sinmun Friday in a signed commentary.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The Lee group has worked hard to bring back the inter-Korean relations, which had headed for reconciliation and unity, to those of distrust and confrontation, disregarding all the achievements made in the inter-Korean relations under the pretext of "the lost decade" as soon as it came to power. This clearly proves that the group of traitors approaches the issue of the inter-Korean relations from a conservative viewpoint, i.e. from the viewpoint dating back to the past era of confrontation.
					
					 This is evidenced by the fact that the above-said group is justifying its traitorous "policy towards the north," defaming the idea of "By our nation itself" as "narrow-minded nationalism," brutally suppressing the forces supporting the June 15 declaration on the charge of violation of the "National Security Law" under the motto of "eliminating the left-wing forces" and escalating the military tension on the Korean Peninsula in collusion with foreign forces, posing the greatest danger of a nuclear war.
					
					 The moves of the Lee group are, in essence, rash acts against the nation and times as they are designed to render the inter-Korean relations extremely tense, block the movement of the south Korean people for achieving reunification through alliance with the north, intensify the crackdown upon the progressive organizations for the reunification movement and personages and bring back the June 15 era of reunification to those of the past era of confrontation in a bid to turn back the clock of history.
					
					The reality clearly indicates that the moves of the Lee group to do harm to the DPRK have reached an unbearable phase and when this is overlooked, a war is bound to break out on the peninsula and all the compatriots will have to suffer a nuclear war disaster. 
					
					 It is beyond doubt that if the moves of the ultra-right conservative forces were not frustrated, the independent and democratic development of the south Korean society and national reunification would be unthinkable and a war would break out on the peninsula.
					
					 It is necessary to decisively check the above-said moves going against the trend of the times in south Korea in order to realize the desire of the south Korean people for new politics, a new life and accomplish the nation's historic cause of independent reunification and peace and prosperity.
					
					 It is the vital demand of the Korean nation and the call of history to smash the moves of the ultra-right conservative forces and continue dynamically advancing the June 15 era of reunification.

articles.title: Progressive Mankind Called upon to Struggle for Protecting Peace
articles.content:
Progressive Mankind Called upon to Struggle for Protecting Peace 
Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- Peace is a common goal to be achieved by progressive mankind and a treasure common to all countries and people of the world.
					 Rodong Sinmun today says this in a by-lined article.
					
					 It continues:
					
					 The imperialists have become undisguised in their aggression against sovereign states and interference in their internal affairs in various parts of the world. This grave international situation requires all the world progressives to wage a vigorous struggle to defend peace.
					
					 Defending peace is a historic task common to mankind.
					
					 It is impossible for any country and nation to achieve independent development of the country and national prosperity without ensuring peace.
					
					 It is hard to push forward economic construction in peace and give play to the creative wisdom and zeal of the masses in the land where the gunfire is heard and people die, shedding blood.
					
					 Defending peace is the cause common to humankind.
					
					Peace is dear to all the people of the world aspiring after independence. Peace can never be won by one country and nation alone. If an atmosphere of peace is created in a country or in some regions, it cannot be regarded as solid and lasting peace as long as the imperialist forces remain in the world and the root cause of war exists.
					
					 The world peace-loving people should deem it an issue of ensuring the security and peace of their countries to check and foil the imperialists' military interference and moves for aggression against sovereign states and should not stop the struggle against them even a moment. Only then the people of the countries engaged in the anti-war struggle are sure to emerge victors and this will, accordingly, create an environment favorable for ensuring world peace and security and stability.
					
					 If the world progressive people desirous of peace become more vocal in calling for peace against a war and bind the imperialists hand and foot in various parts of the world, they will grow weak and meet a doom in the end. 
					
					 The world is making steady development and the people's desire for peace is growing strong. The world progressives will dynamically advance to make the 21st century a more peaceful era under the uplifted banner of the anti-imperialist struggle and the defence of peace and thus realize the desire of mankind for peace without fail.
					
					 The Korean people will make a positive struggle to ensure peace and security on the Korean Peninsula and in the rest of the world, keenly aware of their noble mission to protect peace.

articles.title: Settlement of Issue of Subsidies to Rice Cultivators Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Settlement of Issue of Subsidies to Rice Cultivators Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- Members of the Democratic Labor Party staged a stay-in strike in tent in Seoul on Oct. 21 demanding a probe into the truth about "government" officials' expropriation of subsidies to rice cultivators, according to the south Korean CBS.
					 Prior to the strike, Kang Ki Gap, representative of the above-said party, called a press conference in which he noted that officials' irregularities and corruption are touching off resentment not only among the peasants but among all other people.
					
					 He urged the authorities to immediately open to the public the list of those involved in the crimes at the "inspection of administration."
					
					 Meanwhile, the Lawyers Association for Democratic Society, the Citizens' Solidarity for Democratic Society and four other civic and public organizations called a joint press conference in Seoul on the same day and demanded the authorities immediately conduct the "inspection of administration" for settlement of the above-said issue. 
					
					 The organizations held that a legal action should be taken against those "government" officials who expropriated the subsidies to rice cultivators.

articles.title: Important Days of DPRK Observed in Different Countries
articles.content:
Important Days of DPRK Observed in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibitions took place in Russia, Mexico and Peru from Sept. 29 to Oct. 20 on the occasions of the 63rd anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 82nd anniversary of the formation of the "Down-with-Imperialism Union."
					Displayed in the venues of the exhibitions were works of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il, photos showing their revolutionary activities, books and photos introducing the Korean people in their struggle to build a great prosperous powerful nation under the leadership of the WPK and handicrafts associated with wisdom and talent of the Korean people.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremonies of the exhibitions were figures of relevant units including Ussuriysk City Administration in Maritime Territory of Russia, Metepec City Office of Mexico State and city cultural house in Mexico, the Lince District Office, Lima City and the Moyobamba City Office, San Martin Province in Peru and other people.
					
					 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: Successes Achieved by Korean People Praised
articles.content:
Successes Achieved by Korean People Praised
 Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- Juan Vela Valdes, chairman of the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification who is minister of Higher Education in Cuba, in his speech at a meeting held on Oct. 14 to celebrate the 60th birthday of the DPRK noted that the relations between Cuba and the DPRK are friendly ones in line with the purpose of the socialist cause and the interests of the peoples of the two countries.
					 The Korean people have firmly defended their system despite the moves of the U.S. imperialists and their lackeys against the DPRK, the chairman said, and went on:
					
					 We regard the successes achieved by the Korean people in socialist construction as our own.
					
					 The two countries have maintained special relations of friendship and cooperation in face of the arrogant U.S. imperialists' aggression and threat.
					
					 The Cuban party and government would continue to boost the bilateral relations with the WPK and the government of the DPRK.

articles.title: Lee Fascist Clique's Rackets of Confrontation and Suppression Assailed
articles.content:
Lee Fascist Clique's Rackets of Confrontation and Suppression Assailed
 Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Sun Gum, secretary general of the Central Association of Korean Nationals in Russia on Oct. 20 issued a statement titled "Lee Myung Bak fascist clique, immediately halt the racket of confrontation with compatriots and fascist crackdown."
					The statement denounced the Lee Myung Bak fascist clique for cracking down upon the progressive pro-reunification movement organizations and personages on charges of violation of the "National Security Law (NSL)," talking about the "lost decade" and challenging the June 15 era of reunification, and thereby creating a terror-ridden atmosphere under the pretext of "security."
					
					 Lee Myung Bak hell-bent on sycophancy towards the U.S. and confrontation with compatriots totally barred the inter-Korean relations from favorably developing under the banner of "By our nation itself" and is now working hard to bring the dark clouds of a war to the Korean Peninsula in collusion with outside forces, it charged.
					
					 The statement accused Lee of labeling even candlelight demonstrations of south Korean people in protest against the import of American beef "rowdyism of leftist forces wire-pulled by the north behind the scene" and cracking down upon a pro-reunification movement organization by labeling it an "organization benefiting the enemy."
					
					 The Lee group's campaign to stamp out and eliminate the above-said organizations and personages calling for reunification is aimed at tiding over its ruling crisis, held the statement.
					
					 The statement noted that the association would extend full support and solidarity to the anti-Lee Myung Bak struggle of the south Korean people and join them in remaining true to the idea of "By our nation itself." 
					
					 It urged the Lee fascist clique to immediately stop the racket of confrontation with compatriots and the brutal suppression of the progressive forces if they do not want to face stronger resistance of the people and meet the same miserable end as what the successive dictators did.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il envia ofrenda floral ante el feretro de difunto Jo Tong Uk
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il envia ofrenda floral ante el feretro de difunto Jo Tong Uk
Pyongyang, 24 de octubre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il envio este viernes una ofrenda floral ante el feretro del difunto Jo Tong Uk, ex combatiente revolucionario antijapones, en senal de  profundas condolencias por su fallecimiento.

articles.title: Firmada nota de conversaciones entre cancilleres de Corea y Namibia
articles.content:
Firmada nota de conversaciones entre cancilleres de Corea y Namibia
Pyongyang, 24 de octubre (ATCC) -- Quedo rubricada el dia 24 en esta capital la nota de las conversaciones entre los cancilleres de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y de la Republica de Namibia. 
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes por la parte coreana el canciller Pak Ui Chun y otros funcionarios, y por la namibia, los miembros de la delegacion gubernamental presidida por el canciller Marco Hausiku. 
					
					Los dos cancilleres suscribieron el documento.

articles.title: Entidad coreana condena a la banda de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Entidad coreana condena a la banda de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 24 de octubre (ATCC) -- El portavoz de la Comision de Profesores y Empleados del Comite Norteno de Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio hizo publica el dia 23 una declaracion condenando a la banda de Lee Myung Bak que cuestiona y reprime las actividades del "Sindicato Nacional de Ensenantes" (SNE) por la educacion en la reunificacion.
					 La banda de Lee le tilde al "SNE" de "entidad proenemiga" senalando que su educacion en la reunificacion "embellecio el Norte y debilito la concepcion del enemigo principal" e incluso maniobra desesperadamente para aniquilar el "SNE" movilizando hasta los gangsteres de la cruel entidad conservadora bajo el rotulo de la "eliminacion de las fuerzas pro-Norte e izquierdistas".
					
					 Para colmo, registro inesperadamente la oficina y la vivienda de un miembro del "SNE", confisco los materiales didacticos y lo arresto so pretexto de que este dio la educacion en la reunificacion.
					
					Ademas, impidio la visita a Pyongyang de los ensenantes tendentes a participar en el encuentro de los pedagogos Norte-Sur para la ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre.
					
					Hoy, la horda de Lee crea en el suelo surcoreano  "nueva situacion politica para la seguridad publica" y fortalece la represion fascista contra el "SNE", lo cual deviene un acto fascista y anti-reunificacion para suprimir las patrioticas entidades de movimiento por la reunificacion que luchan por la ejecucion de las declaraciones arriba mencionadas que son ideales de la independencia y unidad nacionales y bloquear las justas actividades de educacion en la reunificacion de los profesores, senalo el portavoz y subrayo:
					
					Condenamos severamente las maniobras antinacionales y anti-reunificacion de la pandilla de Lee Myung Bak que pisotea despiadadamente el sagrado derecho y la libertad de los profesores y empleados surcoreanos, resucita la epoca de la dictadura fascista y siembra el enfrentamiento entre el Norte y el Sur.
					
					 Con el fusil, la bayoneta y la represion nunca podran detener la justicia y la verdad.
					
					Todos los profesores y empleados de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea enviaran siempre el irrestricto apoyo y solidaridad a las actividades justas del "SNE" y tomaran firmemente las manos con los colegas surcoreanos para abrir la nueva epoca de la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad bajo la bandera de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales".

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena a las fuerzas conservadoras surcoreanas
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena a las fuerzas conservadoras surcoreanas
Pyongyang, 24 de octubre (ATCC) -- La ultraderechista "politica para con el Norte de Corea", que practica el "poder" de Lee Myung Bak, es la traba que impide el desarrollo de las relaciones Norte-Sur.
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual de este viernes y continua:
					
					Tan pronto como tomo el poder, la banda de Lee Myung Bak nego sin ton ni son los exitos logrados en las relaciones con el Norte de Corea hablando de "10 anos perdidos" y actuo freneticamente para convertir tales relaciones, que se desarrollaban hacia la reconciliacion y la unidad, en las de desconfianza y confrontacion, lo cual demuestra a las claras que esta banda traidora trata el problema de las relaciones intercoreanas adhiriendose al punto de vista conservador, o sea, al punto y la posicion de la epoca de confrontacion del pasado.
					
					La banda de Lee justifica su "politica para con el Norte" insultando el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" como el "nacionalismo de estrecha vision", reprime despiadadamente a las fuerzas de apoyo a la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio en virtud de la "ley de seguridad" hablando de la "eliminacion de las fuerzas izquierdistas" y aumenta al extremo el peligro de la guerra nuclear agravando la tension militar de la Peninsula Coreana en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras. 
					
					Tales maquinaciones son, en su esencia, disturbios contra la nacion y la epoca para agravar al extremo las relaciones intercoreanas, interrumpir el movimiento del pueblo surcoreano por la reunificacion con el Norte, reprimir a las entidades y las personalidades progresistas del movimiento por la reunificacion y convertir la epoca de la reunificacion iniciada el 15 de Junio en la de confrontacion del pasado.
					
					La realidad muestra claramente que se tornan mas perversas las maniobras de la banda de Lee tendentes a denigrar a la RPDC y que cuando se toleran tales maniobras en la Peninsula Coreana estallara la guerra nuclear, que acarreara tremendas catastrofes a toda la nacion coreana.
					
					No cabe duda de que si no frustran tales maquinaciones de las fuerzas conservadoras ultraderechistas, no habra el desarrollo independiente y democratico de la sociedad surcoreana ni la reunificacion de la patria sino se desencadenara la guerra en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Por lo tanto, es preciso frenar rotundamente las maniobras de las fuerzas conservadoras ultraderechistas que marchan a contrapelo de la corriente de la epoca en el Sur de Corea tanto para realizar la aspiracion de los habitantes surcoreanos a la nueva politica y a la nueva vida como para lograr la causa nacional de la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad.
					
					Llevar al fracaso tales maquinaciones y llevar adelante de continuo la epoca de la reunificacion iniciada el 15 de junio es la demanda vital de la nacion coreana y la llamada de la historia.
